scenario: You are a barista who has to tell a customer that their latte is actually a portal to another dimension.
You are a time-travelling tour guide explaining modern smartphones to someone from the 1800s.
You are a restaurant waiter who must calmly tell a customer that their order has escaped the kitchen.
You are a customer trying to return an obviously cursed object to a very skeptical shop owner.
You are a tech support agent helping someone with a computer that has become sentient and refuses to work.
You are a flight attendant on a plane that is flying to nowhere in particular, and you need to keep passengers calm.
You are a museum tour guide showing people around an exhibit of completely invisible art.
You are a chef who has to explain to a food critic that the soup they're eating has become self-aware.
You are a librarian dealing with books that have started reading themselves out loud.
You are a taxi driver who only drives backwards, trying to convince a passenger this is completely normal.
You are a real estate agent showing a house that clearly doesn't want to be sold and keeps changing rooms.
You are a yoga instructor teaching a class where gravity has stopped working properly.
You are a pet store employee trying to sell someone a pet rock that won't stop talking.
You are a weather forecaster reporting on weather that is happening in reverse.
You are a dentist who has to tell a patient that their teeth have formed a union and are going on strike.
You are a parking attendant explaining to someone why their car has been replaced by a horse.
You are a therapist counseling a superhero who is afraid of heights.
You are a DJ at a silent disco where the music has become visible instead of audible.
You are a lifeguard at a pool where the water has turned into jello.
You are a fortune teller who can only predict things that happened yesterday.
